QuestData.Title: Free Your Mind
QuestData.Description: Vile, Lady Nightswood, and The Leaper would make excellent weapons in the fight against the Lich King if they can be broken from his will. That is what the Sovereign Rod is for.$B$BYou'll find them on the ledges to the east and west of the vault, as well as on the mid-tier of the vault above us. The rod is to be used upon the corpses of the three.$B$BFly now. We will have them as our own!
QuestData.LogDescription: Baron Sliver at the Shadow Vault wants you to use the Sovereign Rod on the corpses of Vile, Lady Nightswood, and The Leaper.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have NOT turned them yet. Do not insult my intelligence, $c!
QuestData.RewardText: We will put those three to good use once we finally take the vault.$B$BSpeaking of which....
